nodes.label: Integration Creates Complexity
nodes.summary: All higher complexity emerges through cooperative integration. Atoms → molecules → cells → organisms → societies → consciousness.

nodes.label: Social Connection Reduces Mortality
nodes.summary: Meta-analysis of 2.2M people: social isolation increases mortality 32%. Effect comparable to smoking.

nodes.label: Love is Universal
nodes.summary: Romantic love found in 166 of 166 cultures studied. Human universal, not Western invention.

nodes.label: Alignment Enables Flourishing
nodes.summary: Aligning with integration (love, connection, cooperation) enables human flourishing.

nodes.label: Wang et al. 2023
nodes.summary: Nature Human Behaviour meta-analysis: 90 cohort studies, 2.2M participants. Social isolation +32% mortality, loneliness +14%.

nodes.label: Holt-Lunstad et al. 2010
nodes.summary: PLoS Medicine meta-analysis: 148 studies, 308,849 participants. 50% increased survival with strong social relationships.

nodes.label: Jankowiak & Fischer 1992
nodes.summary: Ethnology study: 166 cultures via Yale HRAF database. Romantic love found in vast majority of cultures.

nodes.label: VanderWeele et al. 2016
nodes.summary: JAMA Internal Medicine: 89,708 women, 14 years. Religious attendance: 20-30% lower depression, 5x lower suicide.

nodes.label: Anderson 1972 'More is Different'
nodes.summary: Science paper establishing emergence theory. Higher complexity emerges from integration of simpler components.

nodes.label: Tononi IIT 2004
nodes.summary: Integrated Information Theory: consciousness emerges from information integration (Φ).

nodes.label: CTRA (Inflammatory Genes)
nodes.summary: Conserved Transcriptional Response to Adversity: isolation upregulates inflammatory genes, downregulates antiviral.

nodes.label: Oxytocin System
nodes.summary: Social bonding hormone: reduces stress, promotes trust, cardiovascular protective effects.

nodes.label: HPA Axis Buffering
nodes.summary: Social support buffers cortisol response to stress. Well-established mechanism.

nodes.label: Inter-Brain Synchrony
nodes.summary: Neural synchronization between connected individuals. Hasson, Dikker research.

nodes.label: Quantum-Classical Interface
nodes.summary: L0.5 layer: how quantum effects translate to classical neural activity. Critical gap.

nodes.label: Causation vs Correlation
nodes.summary: Most evidence is correlational. Need more RCTs on social interventions.
